articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: Legends League Cricket Final Live Score Updates: Jacques Kallis slams 50, World Giants post 147/4 in 20 overs - The Indian Express
articles.description: World Giants vs Asia Lions, Legends League Cricket Final: The Afridi-led Lions beat Aaron Finch's World Giants in the final game of the tournament at the West End Park International Cricket Stadium in Doha.
articles.content:
Here's a closer look at the two squads:
Asia Lions Squad: Upul Tharanga(w), Tillakaratne Dilshan, Mohammad Hafeez, Asghar Afghan, Thisara Perera, Abdur Razzak, Shahid Afridi(c), Misbah-ul-Haq, Sohai… [+422 chars]
